2409.15997.title: Improvements to SDXL in NovelAI Diffusion V3
2409.15997.paper_summary:
In this technical report, we document the changes we made to SDXL in the
process of training NovelAI Diffusion V3, our state of the art anime image
generation model.
2409.15997.paper_summary_zh: 在此技術報告中，我們記錄了在訓練 NovelAI Diffusion V3 的過程中對 SDXL 所做的變更，這是我們最先進的動漫影像生成模型。
2409.15997.author: Juan Ossa et.al.
2409.15997.authors: Juan Ossa, Eren Doğan, Alex Birch, F. Johnson
